alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued March 15 at 1:21PM PDT until March 16 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 10 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 degrees will result in frost formation. * WHERE...South Central Oregon Coast and Curry County Coast, including the communities of Coos Bay, Myrtle Point, Powers, Bandon, Port Orford and Reedsport. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 10 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
